content: Initial DRAFT TSMG Mission & Charter located as a sub-page to TSC here. This will change once TSMG gets its own confluence site.

Initial Review of TSMG Mission/Charter
Read the draft: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/TSC/Terminology+Services+Management+Group+%28TSMG%29+Mission+and+Charter+-+DRAFT
Share your thoughts here.

I would like to see a formal relationship to the other management groups - as they're going to be coordinating/communicating/specifying many of the requirements that the terminology services need to satisfy.
@lloyd, what would a "formal relationship" look like? How would we specify one?

"The TSMG will liaise with the product family management groups to ascertain the terminology requirements of the standards produced by HL7 and will liaise with the Implementation Division to ascertain the terminology requirements of the implementer community." might be good. Something that indicates where you're going to get direction for the needs you're setting up to meet.
